Sentencas: Two types of lanthanum based chromite-titanate perovskite materials have been tested for use as porous ceramic anodes in SOFC applications.
Titulo: Impedance Studies on Chromite-Titanate Porous Electrodes under Reducing Conditions

Sentencas: The calcium-or strontium-doped chromium-rich materials, with composition La(0.7)A(0.3)Cr(0.8)Ti(0.2)O(3-delta) (A = Ca, Sr), showed p-type conductivity under reducing conditions.
Titulo: Impedance Studies on Chromite-Titanate Porous Electrodes under Reducing Conditions

Sentencas: The titanium-rich composition, La(0.7)Ca(0.3)Cr(0.2)Ti(0.8)O(3-delta), showed n-type conductivity.
Titulo: Impedance Studies on Chromite-Titanate Porous Electrodes under Reducing Conditions

Sentencas: Both type of materials were active electrodes in a H(2)/H(2)O gas mixture at 850 degrees C.
Titulo: Impedance Studies on Chromite-Titanate Porous Electrodes under Reducing Conditions

Sentencas: Gerischer type response was observed in the electrode dispersion.

Sentencas: The high frequency 'cut-off' resistance showed a significant dependence on P(O2), similar to that found for the electronic conductivity.
